comments.commentBody:
Obama’s former speechwriter Jon Favreau:

"I'd be careful about reporting that Obama said there was no wiretapping. Statement just said that neither he nor the WH ordered it."
Jon Favreau (@jonfavs) March 4, 2017

Let us all promise that when that brave soul comes forth with the decisive final proof that we desperately need to impeach Trump we will crowd fund that individual so he or she does not have to worry about losing their job. The situation we are in is not tenable. We need to get rid of Trump and fast. He is making our country into a mess that could take a long time to get over. We need to cut our losses and get this madman out ASAP!

You're right on!  It should be the last paragraph in stories involving the possible collusion of Russia and Trump campaign officials to influence Trump's election.  I predict that tomorrow's tweet will talk about the 5,000,000 (3,000,000 isn't enough) illegal immigrants who voted for Hilary.

Oh Donald, is there anything in that pea sized brain of yours? You need to admit to yourself that you are way in over your mental capacity to do the job called for in being president. Why do you lie so much? Did you have a traumatic childhood? Didn't you're daddy love you? Just exactly what's going on with you? First, you tried the "birther" garbage. That didn't work out well did it? Now, you're trying this "wiretapping" scam of yours. What is the matter with you, really?
Here's the deal Donald. Just go away as quickly as you can. Take your little play friends, Bannon and Miller with you. You are a monumental embarrassment to this country. Go live with your best friend Putin, although, he probably wouldn't want you either. Either way, will just go away.

No; however it is an admission that the Court had probable cause to issue the tap because there was evidence that trump was violating an applicable law.  That did not happen, so helped about the application to the Court.  That leaves an illegal (Nixonian) wiretap.  I will take Obama and spot you 1000 runs in the top of the 9th inning.

The President makes an extremely strong argument for the appointment of a special prosecutor to look into the whole Election/Russiagate controversy with a wide scope including Clinton, Obama, Schumer, Trump, Flynn, Kushner et al. and nay other matter related to rigging or influencing the election and matters such as money laundering or undisclosed loans.
Gioco, You are being sarcastic right?
What about you taking that role?
My grade school students are way more psychologically healthy and capable of taking responsibility for their words and actions than he is.

It is obvious that your democracy is at the beginning of a fight for its very survival. Russia is finally winning the Cold War, I just NEVER expected that the sitting president of the United States would also be an active Russian operative.

Russia has something on Trump. It's the only plausible explanation for all this. So, if Russia can hack you, maybe someone needs to hack Russia, and find out what they're holding over Trump...?
trump is unfit to serve.  The entire country is punished by his obsession with himself, which is needed to puff up his incredibly fragile ego.  He is the Gaslighter in Chief.
Simple: while reading Breitbart, Trump tweeted.  No news story, no leaks, just made-up stories by Mark Levin and Joel Pollak, just another diversion.  Nothing here, move on ...

@Eric
David Axelrod:
"If there were the wiretap @realDonaldTrump loudly alleges, such an extraordinary warrant would only have been OKed by a court for a reason."
— David Axelrod (@davidaxelrod) March 4, 2017

I was born in Cuba in 1956. Growing up you quickly learned that all the truths came from one source Fidel Castro. Anyone able or willing to counter those truths with any other facts, was either jailed or killed. I am wondering when that scenario is going to start here in America?
I am Cuban too, and I did not run but fought: Don't be ridiculous.

NYT, why do you reward Trump's ridiculous tweeting with a front page news story?  I can see why you want to to report on it but couldn't you just bury this somewhere in the politics section?  He's playing you.
It's Trump clever  ploy...shift blame and attention to others   while the Russian probe, Jeff Sessions and other indiscretions  escapes.... Trump played the media 'like a fiddle'

Ridiculous. The president of the United States made a baseless, slanderous accusation against his predecessor. That's news. The Times isn't "rewarding" Trump. It's accurately reporting the facts, including the fact that his tweet may well be based on an erroneous Breitbart fake news story. That should call into question the competence and judgment of the most powerful man in the world.

This notion that Trump is a master manipulator of the media because he changes the subject from one scandal by essentially creating another is nonsense. The scandals don't go away. They pile atop one another.

Now I know what "Fake News" is all about.  Trump wakes up in the middle of the night and tweets about whatever nightmare he just had.  This time he imagined that he was under investigation for one of his crimes.  But, it was not a really a nightmare because he knew it was true. The blaming Obama part - he just made that up.

Trump is doing what he has always done when he seems to be losing ... He uses a diversion. The press qnd some members of congress were doubting the ditness kf the new attorney general so Trump decides to use diversion until the Sessions fire cools off. It is sad that whatever Trump days (tweets) gets press. He started his political campaign with twets about Obama and oerhaps he will have his political career ended with similar, unsubstantiqted tweets.
Put up the proof or shut up. More lies from Trump and their tint hat supporters.

“Tapp”? President Trump should refrain from tweeting until he learns to spell.
I’m sure the NSA (No Such Agency) had access to Trump’s communications; I’m just as sure that President Obama did not order this. Please, 25.4; this president is delusional.

Me thinks thou protesteth too much!

Typical of Trump....the only answer he knows to any criticism or to any possible failing is to attack....to never admit any wrong....to never correct the record....to never accept responsibility....to never be humble...but to attack anyone and anybody...

The man is a sham...a carnival barker...a flim flam artist...without an ounce of ethics or a moral center.

His brand keeps depreciating....his only solution is to blame the DC elites and to exit....before it is too late....

Not only is DJT acting like a paranoid baby, it seems evident that he is constipated as well. After all, these tweets are coming in the early AM, when most people arise and take care of their business. The fact that these tweets occur over a one half to
one hour period makes me believe that he is tweeting while sitting on his golden throne, but it seems to take him a long time to pass. Perhaps DJT needs a stool softener as well as a proctologist.

I'm beginning to think that I may try to practice the default defense mechanism of many Republicans: denial. I can't imagine 4 or more years of this man and his irrational assertions (not to mention lack of leadership). It's surreal.

To call a former president "bad or sick" when you've been in office a little over a month is beyond the pale. And to make a baseless claim like this is simply pathetic (and that many out there will take it, hook, line and sinker is a cross of scary and really sad).

Thank you, NYT, for incorporating the unsubstantiated nature of these allegations into your headlines. Please keep it up. Every time. Otherwise, reporting on his allegations = giving them credence. These days, not ok.

WATCH OUT!

Here we go, Trump is trying to distract us from something his team did OR something his team will do!

Get ready for the second shoe to drop...
Is Trump confusing this with a FISA warrant?  Is he talking about his business or the campaign?  Is Trump aware of the differences?

Russia. Russia. Russia.
Indeed, these ... unusual ... Tweetstorms should be reported / archived as future evidence ... but do not be distracted.
Russia.
